functions.name: gzipCompress
functions.description: Takes a string (e.g: stringified json/xml, base64 encoded binary) as an input and returns the string, compressed using gzip compression algorithm. Note: The compressed string can be decompressed by gzipUncompress function.

functions.name: gzipUncompress
functions.description: Takes gzip compressed string as input and returns a string, decompressed using gzip decompression algorithm.
